description.english: Survive 5 days in your fallout shelter.
description.schinese: 在放射性尘埃避难所里生存 5 天。
description.japanese: シェルターで5日間生き延びよ

description.english: Last for 10 days in your fallout shelter.
description.german: Halte es 10 Tage in deinem Atombunker aus.
description.schinese: 在放射性尘埃避难所里生存 10 天。
description.japanese: シェルターで10日間生き延びよ

description.english: Stay in your fallout shelter for 20 days.
description.german: Bleibe 20 Tage lang in deinem Atombunker.
description.schinese: 在放射性尘埃避难所里生存 20 天。
description.japanese: シェルターで20日間生活せよ

description.english: Stay alive in your fallout shelter for 40 days.
description.schinese: 在放射性尘埃避难所里生存 40 天。
description.japanese: シェルターで40日間生き延びよ
description.brazilian: Permaneça vivo 40 dias no abrigo nuclear.

description.english: Beat the fallout shelter survival record.
description.french: Battez le record de survie de l'abri.
description.italian: Batti il record di sopravvivenza nel rifugio.
description.spanish: Bate el récord de supervivencia en refugio.
description.schinese: 打破放射性尘埃避难所生存记录。
description.japanese: 生存記録を破れ
description.turkish: Nükleer sığınak hayatta kalma rekorunu kır.
description.brazilian: Bata o recorde de sobrevivência no abrigo nuclear.

description.english: Collect 10 soup cans from your house.
description.french: Trouvez 10 boîtes de soupe dans la maison.
description.italian: Raccogli 10 barattoli di zuppa in casa.
description.spanish: Busca 10 latas de sopa en casa.
description.schinese: 从你家收集 10 个汤罐头。
description.japanese: 家からスープ缶を10個集めよ
description.brazilian: Pegue 10 latas de sopa da sua casa.

description.english: Collect 10 water bottles from your house.
description.french: Trouvez 10 bouteilles d'eau dans la maison.
description.italian: Raccogli 10 bottiglie di acqua in casa.
description.spanish: Busca 10 botellas de agua en casa.
description.japanese: 家から水のボトルを10本集めよ
description.brazilian: Pegue 10 garrafas d’água da sua casa.

description.english: Break or use everything possible in your shelter.
description.german: Benutze oder zerstöre alles, was es in deinem Bunker gibt.
description.french: Cassez ou utilisez tout ce que l'abri contient.
description.italian: Rompi o usa ogni cosa possibile nel rifugio.
description.koreana: 방공호 안의 모든 것을 파괴하거나 사용합니다.
description.spanish: Rompe o usa todo lo del refugio.
description.schinese: 打破或使用避难所里的任何东西。
description.russian: Сломай или используй в бункере все возможное.
description.japanese: シェルターにあるものを全て破壊・使用せよ
description.polish: Zepsuj i zużyj wszystko co się da w bunkrze.
description.turkish: Sığınağındaki mümkün olan her şeyi kır veya kullan.
description.brazilian: Quebre ou use tudo o que for possível no abrigo.

description.english: Break or use something in your fallout shelter.
description.german: Benutze oder zerstöre etwas in deinem Bunker.
description.french: Brisez ou utilisez un objet de l'abri.
description.italian: Rompi o usa qualcosa presente nel rifugio.
description.koreana: 방공호 안에 있는 물건을 파괴하거나 사용합니다.
description.spanish: Rompe o utiliza algo del refugio.
description.schinese: 打破或使用放射性尘埃避难所里的东西。
description.russian: Сломай или используй что-то в бункере.
description.japanese: シェルター内で何かを破壊または使用せよ
description.polish: Zepsuj lub użyj czegoś w schronie.
description.turkish: Nükleer sığınağındaki bir şeyi kır veya kullan.
description.brazilian: Quebre ou use algo no abrigo nuclear.

description.english: Turn your fallout shelter into a madhouse.
description.german: Verwandle deinen Atombunker in eine Irrenanstalt.
description.french: Changez l'abri en asile de fous.
description.italian: Trasforma il rifugio antiatomico in un manicomio.
description.spanish: Convierte tu refugio en un manicomio.
description.schinese: 把放射性尘埃避难所变成疯人院。
description.japanese: シェルター内をちらかしまくれ
description.turkish: Nükleer sığınağını bir akıl hastanesine çevir.
description.brazilian: Transforme o seu abrigo nuclear em um hospício.

description.english: Scavenge each item at least once.
description.french: Ramassez chaque objet au moins 1 fois.
description.italian: Raccogli ogni oggetto almeno una volta.
description.spanish: Recoge cada objeto al menos una vez.
description.schinese: 每样东西至少打扫一次。
description.russian: Собери каждый предмет как минимум один раз.
description.japanese: 各アイテムを1回以上入手せよ
description.polish: Zbierz każdy przedmiot co najmniej raz.
description.turkish: Her eşyaya en az bir kez sahip ol.
description.brazilian: Busque cada item pelo menos uma vez.

description.english: Complete the government endorsed fallout drill.
description.german: Nimm an der staatlichen Atomschutzübung teil.
description.koreana: 정부 인증 핵공격 대피 훈련을 완료합니다.
description.spanish: Completa el entrenamiento de supervivencia oficial.
description.schinese: 完成政府批准的放射性原子弹训练。
description.japanese: 政府による訓練を完了せよ
description.turkish: Devlet tarafından hazırlanan nükleer felaket tatbikatını tamamla.

description.japanese: すべての終わり

description.spanish: Consigue que os rescaten los militares.
description.japanese: 軍が無事救出

description.english: Show those mutant roaches who is in charge.
description.german: Zeige den mutierten Kakerlaken, wer das Sagen hat.
description.french: Montrez aux cafards mutants qui commande.
description.italian: Mostra a quegli scarafaggi mutanti chi è che comanda.
description.spanish: Enseña a las cucarachas mutantes quién manda aquí.
description.schinese: 让突变蟑螂知道谁才是老大。
description.russian: Покажи тараканам-мутантам, кто в доме хозяин.
description.japanese: 突然変異したゴキブリをやっつけろ
description.polish: Pokaż tym zmutowanym karaluchom, kto tu rządzi.
description.turkish: O mutant hamam böceklerine hadlerini bildir.
description.brazilian: Mostre às baratas mutantes quem manda aqui.

description.schinese: 死在放射性尘埃避难所里。
description.japanese: シェルター内で死亡
新しい友人を見つけよ
家族全員を救え。

description.schinese: 在你家克服 1337 项困难。
description.japanese: 家にある物に1337回ぶつかれ

description.english: Trim Ted's beard the trendy way.
description.german: Verpasse Teds Bart einen neuen Schnitt.
description.french: Faites une barbe tendance à Ted.
description.italian: Dai un taglio trendy alla barba di Ted.
description.spanish: Córtale la barba a Ted para ir a la moda.
description.schinese: 把 Ted 的胡子修成时髦的造型。
description.japanese: テッドのヒゲを小粋に剃れ
description.polish: Przytnij brodę Teda w modny sposób.
description.turkish: Ted karakterinin sakalını modaya uygun kes.
description.brazilian: Deixe Ted com uma barba moderna.

displayName.polish: Nie ma to jak w domu

description.english: Get to the shelter before the bomb hits.
description.german: Schaffe es vor dem Bombeneinschlag in den Bunker.
description.italian: Raggiungi il rifugio prima che cada la bomba.
description.spanish: Ve al refugio antes de que caiga la bomba.
description.schinese: 在原子弹爆炸前躲进避难所。
description.russian: Спрячься в убежище до атомного взрыва.
description.japanese: 爆弾が落ちる前にシェルターに逃げ込め
description.polish: Dostań się do schronu, nim spadnie bomba.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao abrigo antes de a bomba cair.

description.japanese: 突然変異種！

description.english: Survival is overrated. Stay to see the fireworks!
description.german: Überleben ist überbewertet. Genieße das Feuerwerk!
description.french: La survie, c'est pour les nuls. Observez le feu d'artifice.
description.italian: Sopravvivenza sopravvalutata. Resta per vedere i fuochi d'artificio!
description.koreana: 살아남아봐야 별 거 없습니다. 남아서 불꽃놀이나 보죠!
description.spanish: La supervivencia está sobrevalorada. ¡Quédate a ver los fuegos artificiales!
description.schinese: 生存总是被高估。活着看烟花吧！
description.russian: Останьтесь на поверхности во время взрыва и посмотрите салют!
description.japanese: 生き残ろうだなんて大袈裟な。花火でも見よう！
description.polish: Przetrwanie jest przereklamowane. Zostań na fajerwerki!
description.turkish: Hayatta kalmak abartılıyor. Kal ve havai fişek gösterisini izle!
description.brazilian: Sobreviver pra quê? Fique e veja os fogos de artifício!

description.english: Listen to the voices from beyond.
description.german: Höre auf die Stimmen aus dem Jenseits.
description.french: Écoutez les voix de l'autre côté.
description.japanese: 声に耳を澄ませ
description.polish: Wsłuchaj się w głosy nie z tego świata.

description.japanese: 現地の「法執行機関」に行け

description.english: In Apocalypse mode grab only what a real gamer needs.
description.german: Nimm im Apokalypse-Modus nur mit, was ein echter Gamer braucht.
description.french: Ne récupérez que ce dont un vrai joueur a besoin en mode Apocalypse.
description.italian: In modalità Apocalisse prendi solo l'indispensabile.
description.koreana: 세계 멸망 모드에서 진정한 게이머에게 필요한 것만 수집합니다.
description.spanish: En modo Apocalipsis, coge solo lo que necesitaría un auténtico jugón.
description.schinese: 在核灾难模式中，仅拿真正玩家所需的东西。
description.russian: В режиме Апокалипсиса собери только то, что нужно настоящему геймеру.
description.japanese: 世紀末モードでゲーマーが必要な物だけを手に取れ
description.polish: W trybie Apokalipsy zbierz tylko sprzęt dla prawdziwego gracza.
description.turkish: Kıyamet modunda sadece gerçek bir oyuncunun ihtiyacı olan şeyleri al.
description.brazilian: No modo Apocalipse, pegue só o que um verdadeiro gamer precisa.

description.japanese: トイレにぶつかれ

description.english: Win a game in every mode on Little Boy difficulty.
description.german: Gewinne in jedem Modus auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Little Boy.
description.french: Gagnez une partie dans chaque mode en Little Boy.
description.italian: Vinci una partita in ogni modalità a difficoltà Little Boy.
description.koreana: 리틀 보이 난이도로 모든 모드를 클리어합니다.
description.spanish: Gana una partida en cada modo en nivel Churumbel.
description.schinese: 在小男孩难度的所有模式中获胜。
description.russian: Выиграй во всех режимах на уровне сложности Малыш.
description.japanese: 全てのモードをリトルボーイの難易度でクリアせよ
description.polish: Wygraj grę w każdym trybie gry na poziomie trudności Little Boy.
description.turkish: Küçük Çocuk zorluk seviyesindeki her modda bir oyun kazan.
description.brazilian: Vença um jogo em todos os modos na dificuldade Moleque.

description.english: Win a game in every mode on Fat Man difficulty.
description.german: Gewinne in jedem Modus auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Fat Man.
description.french: Gagnez une partie dans chaque mode en Fat Man.
description.italian: Vinci una partita in ogni modalità a difficoltà Fat Man.
description.koreana: 팻 맨 난이도로 모든 모드를 클리어합니다.
description.spanish: Gana una partida en cada modo en nivel Curtido.
description.schinese: 在胖子难度的所有模式中获胜。
description.russian: Выиграй во всех режимах на уровне сложности Толстяк.
description.japanese: 全てのモードをファットマンの難易度でクリアせよ
description.polish: Wygraj grę w każdym trybie gry na poziomie trudności Fat Man.
description.turkish: Büyük A‫dam zorluk seviyesindeki her modda bir oyun kazan.
description.brazilian: Vença um jogo em todos os modos na dificuldade Gordão.

description.english: Win a game in every mode on Tsar Bomba difficulty.
description.german: Gewinne in jedem Modus auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Zar-Bombe.
description.french: Gagnez une partie dans chaque mode en Tsar Bomba.
description.italian: Vinci una partita in ogni modalità a difficoltà Bomba Zar.
description.koreana: 차르 봄바 난이도로 모든 모드를 클리어합니다.
description.spanish: Gana una partida en cada modo en nivel Bomba del Zar.
description.schinese: 在沙皇炸弹难度的所有模式中获胜。
description.russian: Выиграй во всех режимах на уровне сложности Царь-бомба.
description.japanese: 全てのモードをツァーリボンバの難易度でクリアせよ
description.polish: Wygraj grę w każdym trybie gry na poziomie trudności Car Bomba.
description.turkish: Çar Bombası zorluk seviyesindeki her modda bir oyun kazan.
description.brazilian: Vença um jogo em todos os modos na dificuldade Csar Bomba.

description.english: Don't forget to stock your shelter.
description.french: N'oubliez pas de ravitailler votre abri.
description.italian: Non dimenticarti di rifornire il rifugio.
description.koreana: 방공호에 보급품 채우는 걸 잊지 마십시오.
description.schinese: 别忘了在避难所储备物资。
description.russian: Не забудь о запасах в убежище.
description.japanese: シェルターにアイテムを蓄えるのを忘れるな
description.brazilian: Não se esqueça de abastecer seu abrigo.

description.schinese: 与其他荒地探险者结盟。
description.japanese: 生き残った人と手を組む
description.turkish: Diğer nükleer çöl insanlarıyla birlik ol.
description.brazilian: Junte-se aos habitantes da terra de ninguém.

description.japanese: 武器を使わずに防御する
description.polish: Odeprzyj atak bandytów, nie używając broni.
description.brazilian: Defenda-se dos bandidos sem qualquer arma.

description.english: Defeat three bandit attacks in one game.
description.german: Wehre in einem Spiel drei Räuberangriffe ab.
description.italian: Sconfiggi tre attacchi dei banditi in una partita.
description.koreana: 한 게임에서 강도의 공격을 세 번 막아내십시오.
description.spanish: Defiéndete de los bandidos tres veces en una partida.
description.russian: Защитись от бандитов трижды за игру.
description.japanese: 一回のゲームで悪党を3回倒す
description.polish: Obroń się przed bandytami trzy razy w jednej grze.
description.turkish: Bir oyunda üç haydut saldırısını geri püskürt.
description.brazilian: Defenda-se dos bandidos três vezes em um jogo.

displayName.spanish: Como la palma de tu mano

description.japanese: シェルターを隅々まで探検する
description.brazilian: Explore cada canto de seu abrigo.

description.japanese: 与えれば与えられる

description.french: Dites NON à tout et gagnez.
description.spanish: Di siempre que NO y gana.
description.japanese: どんな選択にもノーと答え、勝利する
description.polish: Zawsze bądź na NIE i wygraj.

description.french: Dites OUI à tout et gagnez.
description.spanish: Di siempre que SÍ y gana.
description.japanese: どんな選択にもイエスと答え、勝利する"
description.polish: Zawsze bądź na TAK i wygraj.

description.japanese: プレゼントを受け取る

description.spanish: Rescata a alguien de los bandidos.
description.japanese: 悪党から仲間を救出
悪の側面

description.schinese: 执行 30 次成功的交易。
description.japanese: 物々交換を30回する

description.french: Réussissez le défi de collecte des fêtes.
description.spanish: Supera el desafío de recogida de las fiestas.
description.russian: Выполни праздничное задание, связанное со сбором припасов.
description.japanese: ホリデー収集チャレンジをクリアしよう。
description.brazilian: Conclua o desafio de coleta das festas.

description.russian: Выполни одно задание, связанное со сбором припасов.
description.japanese: 収集チャレンジを1つクリアしよう。

description.italian: Mettiti un bel cappello alla moda.
description.japanese: スタイリッシュなハットを被ろう。
新たな仲間を見つけよう。

displayName.french: Un temps à ne pas mettre un chat dehors
displayName.italian: C'è un tempo da cani, e gatti

description.french: Il ne peut y en avoir qu'un.
description.japanese: いるのは1匹だけのはず。
description.polish: Ten schron jest za mały dla nas dwóch.

displayName.italian: Un barattolo di zuppa nello spazio
displayName.russian: Приключения банки супа в открытом космосе

description.japanese: 星に手を伸ばす。

description.english: Find your way into the VIP bunker.
description.german: Finde einen Weg in den VIP-Bunker.
description.french: Trouver le chemin du bunker VIP.
description.italian: Trova la strada verso il bunker dei VIP.
description.spanish: Encuentra la manera de llegar hasta el refugio VIP.
description.japanese: VIPシェルターに続く道を探せ。

description.english: Learn to serve and obey the new masters.
description.german: Lerne, den neuen Herren zu dienen und zu gehorchen.
description.french: Apprendre à servir et obéir aux nouveaux maîtres.
description.italian: Impara a servire e a obbedire ai nuovi padroni.
description.koreana: 봉사하는 법을 배우고 새로운 주인을 따르자.
description.spanish: Aprende a servir y a obedecer a los nuevos amos.
description.schinese: 学着服侍和服从新主人。
description.japanese: 新たな主に仕え、従うのだ。
description.turkish: Yeni efendilere hizmet ve itaat etmeyi öğren.
description.brazilian: Aprenda a servir e a obedecer aos novos mestres.

description.english: Look at me. I'm the captain, meow.
description.german: Schau mich an. Ich bin jetzt der Kapitän, miau.
description.french: Regarde-moi. Je suis le capitaine, miaou.
description.russian: Взгляни на меня. Теперь я здесь главный. Мяу!
description.japanese: こちらを見よ。我がキャプテンだにゃー。
description.brazilian: Olhe pra mim. Sou o capitão, miau.

description.english: Live through the nuclear blast as Dolores.
description.german: Überlebe die nukleare Explosion als Dolores.
description.french: Survivez à l'explosion nucléaire dans la peau de Dolores.
description.spanish: Sobrevive a la explosión nuclear como Dolores.
description.schinese: 扮演 Dolores 在灾后幸存下来。
description.russian: Переживи ядерный взрыв, играя за Долорес.
description.japanese: ドローレスになって核爆発の中を生き抜け。
description.turkish: Dolores ile nükleer patlamadan sağ kurtul.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva à explosão nuclear como Dolores.

description.japanese: 踊らせろ。

description.french: Reprenez contact avec de vieux amis.
description.spanish: Retoma el contacto con viejos amigos.
description.japanese: 旧友と再会せよ。
女性のアパートを探せ。

description.english: If you play it, they will come.
description.german: Sie tauchen auf, wenn du spielst.
description.schinese: 如果你演奏，它们就会来。
description.japanese: 演奏すれば来る。

displayName.japanese: 食らえ、ブランドルフライめ！

description.italian: Schiacciala con tutta la forza che hai.
description.japanese: 会心のハエ叩きだ。

description.russian: Выполни одно задание, связанное с выживанием.
description.japanese: サバイバルチャレンジをひとつクリアしよう。

description.english: Okay: three, two, one, let's jam!
description.german: Okay, three, two, one, let's jam!
description.french: Okay, three, two, one, let's jam !
description.italian: Ok... Tre, due, uno, facciamo jam!
description.koreana: 좋아, 셋, 둘, 하나, 뭉개 버리세요!

description.japanese: クールに逃げるのだ。
